column2: 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: I have been taking Esgic for about 5 years now. I have TMJ and get headaches at least 4 to 5 days a week. This medication gets rid of the headaches usually with 1 pill. I dont leave home without this medicine, because the headaches just come up out of nowhere. Dont know what I would do without Esgic!!

column2: Scott, 35-44 Male  on Treatment for 5 to less than 10 years (Patient)
column9: I've had periodic extreme tension headaches for years.  After trying over the counter medications, I went to my doctor and was at first diagnosed with a migraine problem and prescribed a migraine medication that simply didn't work and had the side effect of making me dizzy.  She then prescribed Esgic which has done the trick. Taken exactly as prescribed, this is a great resource for severe tension-type headaches.
